long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This small extension allows you to synchronize bookmark folders with a remote document.

The remote document can either be RSS, Atom, OPML, HTML, or a 'bookmarks' JSON format.

Ideal to share a bunch of bookmarks with your team at work, or your loved ones!

------------------
By installing this extension, you agree to the Privacy Policy located here: http://jraf.org/android/privacy-policy.html
